scripts.build: powershell; cd '.\src\custom_page\Reldur''s_Gate'; msbuild Reldurs_Gate.csproj /p:PublishUrl=..\..\..\dist\publish /p:DeployOnBuild=true /p:Configuration=Release /p:WebPublishMethod=FileSystem /p:DeployTarget=WebPublish /p:AutoParameterizationWebConfigConnectionStrings=false; cd '..\..\..\'; webpack -p
